title: Kinetic energy of objects after collision

content.prompt: A 1.0 kg lump of clay is sliding to the right on a frictionless surface with speed 2 m/s . It collides head-on and sticks to a 0.5 kg metal sphere that is sliding to the left with speed 4 m/s . What is the kinetic energy of the combined objects after the collision?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
